posts.post_content: Looking for the following T206 Hall of Fame cards only in PSA 4, 4.5, or 5. Must be crease and wrinkle free. Centering 35/65 or better either way. Will pay strong within reason: Baker, Walsh, and portraits in Huggins, Waddell & Joss. Please e-mail me at [url]brodcards@aol.com[/url] Thank you.
